libs.uow_tool_belt.DTW.dtw¶

libs.uow_tool_belt.DTW.dtw(st, f=None, D_full=False)¶

Given the function dist, compute the matrice distance of two sequences.

input:

a and b: lists to match dist: function computing the distance between points (takes two floats, return one) D_full: True to have the full matrix in output, False to have the last value.

output:

Matrix of distances or last value

Mercury
